turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you place an online order for me from Annie's Pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Such which location did you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Cane Run Road

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what would you like for me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I have a coupon for two large two topping pizzas and an order of family sized cinnamon sticks for $21.99

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok what did you want on the first pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Double pepperoni and cheese

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And the second pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pepperoni and pineapples.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want any dipping sauce?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, two orders of ranch as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, a two liter of Sprite and that will be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want pick up or delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pick up will be fine. I'll pick up the order on my way home.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok give me just a second

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Take your time

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I've ordered one large pepperoni and cheese pizza, one large pepperoni and pineapple pizza, one family sized order of cinnamon sticks, one two liter of Sprite. Your total is $25.95 including tax and the order will be ready for pick up in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank yoou so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Have a good night!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You too!
